doctor.name: Prof. Dr. Chitta Ranjan Debnath
doctor.degree: MBBS, MCPS (Medicine), MD (Hepatology), MACP, FACP (USA), MRCP, FRCP (UK)
doctor.info: Prof. Dr. Chitta Ranjan Debnath is a Liver Specialist in Mymensingh. His qualification is MBBS, MCPS (Medicine), MD (Hepatology), MACP, FACP (USA), MRCP, FRCP (UK). He is a Professor & Head, Hepatology at Mymensingh Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Popular Diagnostic Center, Mymensingh. Practicing hour of Prof. Dr. Chitta Ranjan Debnath at Popular Diagnostic Center, Mymensingh is 4pm to 10pm (Closed: Friday).

doctor.name: Dr. Md. Fakruzzaman
doctor.info: Dr. Md. Fakruzzaman is a Liver Specialist in Mymensingh. His qualification is MBBS, BCS (Health), FCPS (Medicine), FCPS (Hepatology). He is a Consultant, Hepatology at Mymensingh Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Popular Diagnostic Center, Mymensingh. Practicing hour of Dr. Md. Fakruzzaman at Popular Diagnostic Center, Mymensingh is 5pm to 8pm (Closed: Friday).

doctor.name: Dr. Mohammad Ruhul Haider
doctor.workplace: Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujib Medical University Hospital
doctor.info: Dr. Mohammad Ruhul Haider is a Liver Specialist in Mymensingh. His qualification is MBBS, BCS (Health), MD (Hepatology), MACP (America). He is a Consultant, Hepatology at Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujib Medical University Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Popular Diagnostic Center, Mymensingh. Practicing hour of Dr. Mohammad Ruhul Haider at Popular Diagnostic Center, Mymensingh is 5pm to 8pm (Closed: Friday).

doctor.name: Dr. Md. Ashrafuzzaman
doctor.info: Dr. Md. Ashrafuzzaman is a Liver Specialist in Mymensingh. His qualification is MBBS, MD (Hepatology). He is a Assistant Registrar, Hepatology at Mymensingh Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Sodesh Hospital, Mymensingh. Practicing hour of Dr. Md. Ashrafuzzaman at Sodesh Hospital, Mymensingh is 4pm to 8pm (Closed: Friday).
